uls-desc: Bo'ori tuntuna la fɔla zo'e zo'e ti a ta'am loe yeletɔgum gee maalum ŋmɛresɛ yeletɔgum la
ext-uls-undo-language-tooltip-text-local: Yeletɔgum la tee bo la wiki  kana. Bisɛ [[Special:GlobalPreferences|global preferences]] tee yeletɔgum la bo wiki woo
uls-betafeature-desc: Pa'alɛ yeletɔgum si'a n de nimu'urɛ la girega le yɛla la puan
ext-uls-display-settings-desc: Maalɛ yeletɔgum sebo n tuni bo menu la gulesegɔ la kãtɛ n zuni se'em
ext-uls-language-buttons-help: Yee yeletɔgum la.  La kan paɛ Yeletɔgum sebo n de nimu'urɛ la
ext-uls-display-settings-font-settings: Gulesegɔ katɛ n zuni se'em maalegɔ
ext-uls-display-settings-anon-log-in-cta: [[Special:UserLogin|Log in]] ta'am loe yeletɔgum bo menu duma
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-title: Ve'e gulesegɔ katɛ n zuni se'em la san ta pakɛ
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-info: Ve'e gulesegɔ katɛ n zuni se'em la gee loe fu boti sɛla
ext-uls-webfonts-select-for: Loe gulesegɔ katɛ n zuni se'em bo $1
ext-uls-input-settings-desc: Guleseri la yeletɔgum sebo n boi di tɔka
ext-uls-disable-input-method: Dikɛ yeletɔgum la gulesegɔ kua lɔgerɔ tum
jquery-ime-disable-text: Dikɛ yeletɔgum la gulesegɔ kua lɔgerɔ tum
ext-uls-input-settings-noime: Input sose'ere ka boi bɔ'ɔra yeletɔgum buna wa
ext-uls-input-disable-notification-info-: Fu ta'am yu'e input lɔgerɔ la maalegɔ zi'an la sansɛka woo
Fu ta'am yu'e input lɔgerɔ la maalegɔ zi'an la sansɛka lɔgeloosego zi'an la puan
ext-uls-compact-link-info: Yeletɔgum za'a (sebo ti fum la sɛba pugum loose)
ext-uls-compact-language-links-preferenc: Dikɛ [[$1|compact language list]], yeletɔgesebo n de nimu'urɛ bo fu
ext-uls-compact-no-results: Pɛgedina wa ka boi bɔ'ɔra yeletɔgum la ti fu ɛ la
ext-uls-setlang-error: Tuure n wa'am fu eeri ni yeletɔgum sebo puan la na. Tuure: $1
ext-uls-empty-state-header-actions-avail: Yeletɔgum nan ka boi dikɛ ayima pa'asɛ?
ext-uls-empty-state-desc-actions-availab: Basɛ ti sɛla n boi bini la bɔna yeletɔgum sisesi puan
